title: Amazon Music Unlimited pricing is going up for Prime members
content:
Amazon Music might not be the most-discussed music service around, but it is a popular choice with people already subscribed to Amazon Prime, since there’s a discounted rate just for Prime members. That’s now changing, as Prime members will pay almost the same amount as non-Prime customers for Amazon Music. Amazon Music has many different

The post Amazon Music Unlimited pricing is going up for Prime members appeared first on xda-developers.
